thread.title: Amber Tamblyn and David Cross Share First Photo of Daughter Marlow -- See Her Cute Face!
thread.title_full: Amber Tamblyn and David Cross Share First Photo of Daughter Marlow -- See Her Cute Face!

author: Leena Tailor
title: Amber Tamblyn and David Cross Share First Photo of Daughter Marlow -- See Her Cute Face!

persons.name: dauphinoise petunia brittany scheherazade von funkinstein mustard witch

text: Amber Tamblyn and David Cross Share First Photo of Daughter Marlow -- See Her Cute Face! by Leena Tailor 1:23 PM PDT, March 21, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Amber Tamblyn and David Cross have shared the first photo of their baby girl, Marlow, and she’s a looker! In a hilarious post on Instagram, Cross described his daughter as a “55-year-old furrier.” A post shared by David Cross (@davidcrossofficial) on Mar 20, 2017 at 2:02pm PDT The 33-year-old Joan of Arcadia actress and her husband of four years announced Marlow’s arrival on Feb. 21., by sharing a video of the baby’s foot wriggling around on Instagram. Once again adding humor to their family news, Tamblyn shared a tongue twister of a fake name to the announcement. “David and I are proud to announce the birth of our daughter, Dauphinoise Petunia Brittany Scheherazade Von Funkinstein Mustard Witch RBG Cross Tamblyn-Bey jr. #TheFutureIsFemale,” she wrote. The baby’s real name -- Marlow Alice Cross -- was revealed when Tamblyn shared a photo of a letter she received from Hillary Clinton, congratulating her on the little girl’s arrival. See more on Marlow in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
